name: Putera
description:
IF THE PROJECT SHOWS THUMBNAIL. IT MEANS IT'S LOADING. PLEASE WAITFOR A FEW MIN BECAUSE THE PROJECT IS BIG

The dialog and the story is soooo nonsense.

Created by SpriteStar

Made in Turbowarp / Scratch

Technically made for Gandi IDE x SC Scratch Game Jam 002

Currently Playable / In development

If you experience some bugs. Please tell in the comments below

Putera is a 13 years old boy who is just minding his own business until something fell from the galaxy that landed on his hometown! It's actually a piece from an unknown planet.  The Village Head separated the piece and gave every people on the village the piece one by one. He then decided to upgrade his village. One day, when Putera helped getting a wood from a tree for a construction worker. He found a weird creature trying to take his woods and running away. Will Putera be able to catch them and acknowledge what type of creature that is?
